Description: Ivory handle of a spoon; with cylindrical shalt and wider conical shape at end carved with ridges.
Bibliographic references: Brunton & Caton-Thompson 1928 / The Badarian Civilisation and Predynastic Remains near Badari (p. 31; pl. xxiv.5; pl. xxvii.2)
Acquisition name: Donated by: British School of Archaeology, Egypt
